segments.text: But Sue is indeed beaut . Men can hardly resist such a knock-out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Birds of feather flock together . You must be one of these men .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know little of her . I only think she ’ s pretty and intelligent . Of course , she ’ s diligent , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s enough for you to worship the ground she treats on .
segments.speaker: S2
